subject: Little League World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Hance Smith hit two homers, including a grand slam, to lead Petaluma, Calif., to an 11-1, five-inning victory over San Antonio and a berth in the United States championship game in the Little League World Series at South Williamsport, Pa.
snippet: Hance Smith hit two homers, including a grand slam, to lead Petaluma, Calif., to an 11-1, five-inning victory over San Antonio and a berth in the United States championship game in the Little League World Series at South Williamsport, Pa.
